title: Groupama-FDJ Links up with Wilier Triestina for 2024
content:
The French team has penned a multi-year deal with Wilier Triestina after its 22-year partnership with Lapierre came to an end this season.

Read the full article at Groupama-FDJ Links up with Wilier Triestina for 2024 on Velo.
author: sadhbhoshea
